channel.title: Awesome graphic bug @chapter 12
channel.description:
I just oped a door and it didnt load the graphics behind it.. there was another way through a normal door but i took this one first and it failed. i can walk through it and the texture bug turned.
So i oped the door [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img339/5079/001pob.jpg[/img]
dafuq [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img14/4521/002dck.jpg[/img]
walked through it: [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img407/3892/003rxc.jpg[/img]
opened it with this opponent came out [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img255/1694/004or.jpg[/img]
let's have a look [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img4/2689/005jmh.jpg[/img]
looks good [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img21/9461/006gcc.jpg[/img]
so i think you should only open the door with the button.
because there was a white normal door right behind this red thing. and this was the right way. this red thing to open the door is dispensable cause how i said you can also get out through the white door 2m behind this turnable red thing.

item.title: Awesome graphic bug @chapter 12
item.dc:creator: HD_Home
item.description:
I just oped a door and it didnt load the graphics behind it…
there was another way through a normal door but i took this one first and it failed. i can walk through it and the texture bug turned.

So i oped the door

dafuq

walked through it:

opened it with this opponent came out

let’s have a look

looks good

so i think you should only open the door with the button.

because there was a white normal door right behind this red thing.
and this was the right way. this red thing to open the door is dispensable cause how i said you can also get out through the white door 2m behind this turnable red thing.
